ygData.subject: earning some dough and exp
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All, Trade skills dun seem to make much now except for maybe if you are into Jewellery but then again an enchanter would be the perfect char for it.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi All,

Trade skills dun seem to make much now except for maybe if you are into
Jewellery but then again an enchanter would be the perfect char for it.

Alternatively, probably a better way to go is to kills monsters that will
drop some reasonable loot. This will not only earn you exp but also cash.
Doing trade might earn you more but at the expense of exp unless you're not
keen to level :)

Like yesterday I was alone for about 5 hrs at the bandit camp(not the sister
camp, the other) in LFay . I made 50pp selling the loot from the bandits I
killed and got 2 1/2 bubbs exp at same time. Which I think is not too bad
for a lvl15 char, I guess the trick is finding the right place to hunt
without the crowd.


Bardman Melodeuss of 15th
